placement: Place at top of email as main header image with full width
context: Use in context of: Погрузитесь в тропики! Осенние билеты в Тайланд от 47 424 ₽. Ensure asset aligns with brand guidelines and campaign messaging.
responsiveBehavior: Scale proportionally for mobile devices. Ensure minimum readable size on small screens.

accessibilityRequirements: Ensure alt text is provided: "AI-selected This hero image will serve as the main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Thailand in autumn, showcasing a tropical beach at sunset with vibrant colors.". fallbackStrategy: If image fails to load, display alt text with appropriate background color
